title: Second clash game crashed
body:
Both teams were all ready. Said we were in queue for over a minute. Then crashed. We got awarded the win. We added the other team and played a custom.

https://imgur.com/a/Pu7pZWe

replies.body: Thanks for the screenshot Lalna, when we get all the tournament metrics in, I'll see if I can provide an explanation on what might have happened
